android.manifestAdditions:
<manifest android:installLocation="auto">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET"/>
<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="19" android:targetSdkVersion="28"/>
<application android:enabled="true" android:debuggable="true"
android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:manageSpaceActivity="com.assukar.air.android.utils.services.CustomSpaceActivity" android:allowBackup="true" android:backupAgent="com.assukar.air.android.utils.services.SharedPreferencesBackupAgent" >
<activity android:excludeFromRecents="false"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN"/> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER"/> </intent-filter> </activity>
<activity android:name="com.assukar.air.android.utils.services.CustomSpaceActivity" />
</application>
</manifest>
